text: Hulaŋ 16.5 1 Ko 16.15, 16.19, Kl 4.15, 2 Ti 1.15, Fm 1.2 iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi agɨlaŋ ahica agɨladɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ mɨgudɨbavɨlalɨ agɨlasaŋ lamuladin agasaŋ ua nulɨdɨ sulɨhalaŋ uami. Viaŋ Epainetusɨ saŋ lamuladin agasaŋ ua nudɨ sulɨhalaŋ uami. Viaŋ nusaŋ mavɨn hekɨlɨ hɨnilan uami. Esia fɨli tɨbɨ heŋ nɨbu mɨse Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ saŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamɨci avɨli hɨvɨ nudɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi uami.
